title: Renovated 2-BR Apt. (IDEAL FOR ROOMMATES) Walk to Montefiore Hospital
posting_body: ["**NO BROKER'S FEE**", 'NO BROKER INQUIRES PLEASE', 'CLEAN, QUIET & DESIRABLE APARTMENT BUILDING IN NORWOOD NEAR MONTEFIORE HOSPITAL', 'BEAUTIFUL 2-BEDROOM APARTMENT IDEAL FOR ROOMMATES, MEDICAL RESIDENT STUDENTS, MEDICAL FELLOWS, NURSES & HOSPITAL STAFF', 'OVERVIEW:', "No Broker's Fee (Management Direct)", 'Excellent Maintained Pre-War Building with Quiet and Respectful Tenants', 'Tree-lined Streets', 'Walkable to Subway - #4 and #D Train Lines', 'Walkable to Metro-North Harlem Line', 'Walkable to Shops and Restaurants - 2 Blocks Away', '30 Minute Train Ride to Grand Central Station in Manhattan', 'Convenient to Montefiore Hospital, North Central Bronx Hospital, Jacobi Hospital, St. Barnabas Hospital, Bronx Lebanon Hospital', 'Convenient Housing for Medical Residents, Nurses, Fellows and Hospital Staff', 'Free Street Parking', 'Third Party Garage Parking Available in Neighborhood', 'Cats are Ok.', 'Dogs Are NOT Allowed', 'INCOME REQUIREMENTS:', 'Minimum 40x Monthly Rent to Qualify for the Apartment ($76,000)', 'Must Have Good Credit Rating', 'Criminal Background Check Performed', '$20 Application Fee for each Adult', 'REQUIRED MOVE-IN FUNDS:', "First Month's Rent", 'One Month Security Deposit (Equal to Monthly Rent)', 'BUILDING AND UNIT AMENITIES:', 'Renovated 2-Bedroom Apartment', 'Ideal Apartment for Roommates looking to Split Rent', 'Only $925 per Roommate', 'Hardwood Floors', 'Tenant Laundry Facility Located on Building Premises', 'HD Security Camera System throughout Building', 'Secured Building Lobby Door', 'Building Intercom System', 'Tenant Bicycle Parking on Premises', 'Stove', 'Oven', 'Refrigerator', 'Freezer', 'Live-in Superintendent on Premises', 'Tenant Portal for Online Rent Payments and Maintenance Requests', 'Heat and Water Included in Rent', "Electricity and Cooking Gas are the Tenant's Responsibility (Con Edison)", 'Apartment Wired for Verizon FIOS and Optimum for Cable TV and Internet', 'If interested, please e-mail us or leave us a voice message:', '(718) 4 1 2 - 1 8 4 0', '.', 'MUST ANSWER ALL QUESTIONS BELOW TO PROCEED', 'Full Name:', 'Contact Number:', 'Total Number of People to Occupy the Apartment:', 'Potential Move-in Date:', 'Annual Gross Income:', 'Convenient to: Van Cortlandt Park, Woodlawn, Norwood, Bedford Park, Bainbridge, Mosholu Parkway, Pelham Parkway, Riverdale, City Island, Marble Hill, Country Club, Morris Park, Arthur Ave,Westchester County, Yonkers, Hartsdale, White Plains NY, Scarsdale, Bronxville, Pleasantville, Hastings on Hudson, Yorktown, Mahopac, Putnam County, Peekskill, Ossining, Irvington, New Rochelle, Mosholu Golf Course, Metro North Railroad, Montefiore Medical Hospital Center Albert Einstein Campus, Montefiore Medical Hospital Center Moses Campus, Bronx Care, Jacobi Hospital, North Central Bronx Hospital, Bronx Lebanon Hospital, St. Barnabas Hospital, VA Hospital, Lincoln Medical Center, St. Joseph Hospital, The Bronx Zoo, The New York Botanical Gardens, Fordham University Graduate Student Housing, Teachers, Professors, Fellowship, Achieve Beyond, Pharmacy, Dental, Internal Medicine, Travel Nurses, Student Housing, Pace University, Columbia University, NYU (New York University), Manhattan College, Lehman College, City College, Medical Resident Housing, Sarah Lawrence College.', 'We specialize in finding housing: Brooklyn (Park Slope, Williamsburg, Fort Greene, Cobble Hill, and more!),', 'Queens (Astoria, Long Island City, Forest Hills, Flushing, Ridgewood and more!), Staten Island, In Manhattan (Battery Park, the Financial District, Tribeca, SoHo, Nolita, the Lower East Side, the East Village, the West Village, Greenwich Village, Chelsea, Union Square, the Flatiron District, Gramercy Park, Murray Hill, Midtown East, Midtown West, the Upper East Side, the Upper West Side, Harlem, Washington Heights and Inwood).', 'We also specialize in finding housing for Roommates, International Clients, and more!']
